description: Developed and maintained dynamic web applications for internal management systems using ReactJS, NodeJS, and ExpressJS.
Designed and optimized database schemas in MongoDB and MSSQL for performance and scalability.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to troubleshoot issues, implement features, and deliver production-ready solutions.
Interfaced with global clients to gather requirements, provide technical support, and ensure smooth project delivery.
Advised clients on selecting suitable insurance policies based on their financial needs and goals.
Built and maintained strong client relationships, ensuring long-term policy renewals and customer satisfaction.
Assisted clients with policy documentation, claims processing, and financial planning support.
Utilized MS Office tools to manage client data, prepare reports, and maintain policy records.
